questions.question: What are the same characteristics in "Action", "Adventure" and "Action,Adventure" on different platforms?

answer.value: The value of "Action,Adventure" game is usually higher than other two on most platforms.

key_insights: Action Adventure (second axis) shows the highest peak score of 8.5, suggesting this genre contains some of the best-rated games across all platforms
Adventure (third axis) has the lowest floor score (5.307), which means this genre has the widest spread between its highest and lowest-rated titles.

Nintendo 3DS (green lines) stands out with a very high score in the Action Adventure genre, reaching the 8.5 peak, highlighting this platformâ€™s strength in delivering top-rated action-adventure experiences.
